sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app
    ><v-container class="ma-10">
      <v-col cols="12" class="pa-12">
        <v-card>
          <v-col cols="12" md="4" class="d-flex d-inline-flex">
            <v-col cols="12">
              <v-form>
                <v-text-field
                  v-model="usersname"
                  label="รหัสพนักงาน"
                  v-on:keyup.enter="nextPlease"
                  solo
                ></v-text-field>
                <v-text-field
                  v-model="password"
                  label="รหัสพนักงาน"
                  solo
                  id="input2"
                  type="submit"
                >
                </v-text-field>
                <v-btn rounded color="primary" dark> เข้าสู่ระบบ </v-btn>
              </v-form>
            </v-col>
          </v-col></v-card
        >
      </v-col>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      usersname: "",
      password: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    nextPlease: function (event) {
      document.getElementById("input2").focus();
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
